sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS readings (device_id TEXT, data_id TEXT, timestamp INTEGER, val REAL, unit TEXT);

template:
SELECT
    timestamp, val, unit
FROM
    readings
WHERE
    device_id="{{global.selectedID}}"
AND
    (data_id="batt_voltage");
